active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a multi-tenant SaaS application handling sensitive financial data, debate the pros and cons of dedicated storage accounts per tenant versus shared storage with logical isolation, considering security (e.g., blast radius reduction), cost, scalability, and regulatory compliance (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA). Provide real-world examples like Azure storage misconfigurations where shared approaches failed.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
